Name: Kronk
Text: Redline? Redline! Why is Redline in Kronk Manor?

Name: Redline
Text: I don't get why you call it that. It's the University President's Manor. It's not like it was yours to begin with.

Name: Kronk
Text: Fast lady is right. This isn't Kronks...

Name: Redline
Text: You know what Kronk. I'm off. Toodles..

Name: Redline
Text: Oh yeah, command said University is coming to attack.

Name: Redline
Text: Have fun Kronk, don't go losing like last time!
